au_750416: #!/bin/bash
echo "What is your name?"

if [[ $# -ne 2 ]] ; then
read name1
read name2
echo "Are you really "$name1 "??? or" $name2 "?"
else
echo "Are you really "$1 "??? or" $2 "?"
fi
